```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(eeptools)
```

```{r autoplot.lm, cache = TRUE}


# Univariate
a<-runif(1000)
b<-7*a+rnorm(1)
mymod<-lm(b~a)
autoplot(mymod)

# Multivariate

data(mpg)
mymod<-lm(cty~displ+cyl+drv,data=mpg)
autoplot(mymod)



```
